title: FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster

notes: I can get to the launcher screen and the game starts but freezes after 5-10 seconds.  Have to change the prefix to xp to get .net installed.
title: FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster

notes: You have to switch the prefix to xp to get .net installed then switch it back to Windows 7.  The launcher will launch but if you press settings it will crash. The game will launch but freezes after about 10 seconds. You can workaround the freeze by using PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 in launch option but there are graphical issues in the menus and less so in the game.
title: FINAL FANTASY X/X-2 HD Remaster
